name: Big Head Bash
summary: Blazing guns! Huge explosions! Fast action. Bobble heads?! Set in a world of vinyl collectible toys and insane weapons, Big Head Bash offers a huge selection of selectable characters and gameplay environments. Do you have what it takes to handle this amount of beautifully-rendered explosive action?
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: TPS
  • 游玩人数: 多人
  • 官方网站: http://bigheadbash.com/
